an6.18:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam carati mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim.
an6.18:1.2: Addasa kho bhagava addhanamaggappatipanno annatarasmim padese macchikam macchabandham macche vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamanam.
an6.18:1.3: Disva magga okkamma annatarasmim rukkhamule pannatte asane nisidi.
an6.18:1.5: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amum macchikam macchabandham macche vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamanan”ti?
an6.18:2.2: api nu tumhehi dittham va sutam va:
an6.18:2.3: ‘macchiko macchabandho macche vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamano tena kammena tena ajivena hatthiyayi va assayayi va rathayayi va yanayayi va bhogabhogi va mahantam va bhogakkhandham ajjhavasanto’”ti?
an6.18:2.6: Mayapi kho etam, bhikkhave, neva dittham na sutam:
an6.18:2.7: ‘macchiko macchabandho macche vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamano tena kammena tena ajivena hatthiyayi va assayayi va rathayayi va yanayayi va bhogabhogi va mahantam va bhogakkhandham ajjhavasanto’ti.
an6.18:2.9: Te hi so, bhikkhave, macche vajjhe vadhayupanite papakena manasanupekkhati, tasma so neva hatthiyayi hoti na assayayi na rathayayi na yanayayi na bhogabhogi, na mahantam bhogakkhandham ajjhavasati.
an6.18:3.2: api nu tumhehi dittham va sutam va:
an6.18:3.3: ‘goghatako gavo vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamano tena kammena tena ajivena hatthiyayi va assayayi va rathayayi va yanayayi va bhogabhogi va mahantam va bhogakkhandham ajjhavasanto’”ti?
an6.18:3.6: Mayapi kho etam, bhikkhave, neva dittham na sutam:
an6.18:3.7: ‘goghatako gavo vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamano tena kammena tena ajivena hatthiyayi va assayayi va rathayayi va yanayayi va bhogabhogi va mahantam va bhogakkhandham ajjhavasanto’ti.
an6.18:3.9: Te hi so, bhikkhave, gavo vajjhe vadhayupanite papakena manasanupekkhati, tasma so neva hatthiyayi hoti na assayayi na rathayayi na yanayayi na bhogabhogi, na mahantam bhogakkhandham ajjhavasati.
an6.18:4.2: api nu tumhehi dittham va sutam va:
an6.18:4.6: magaviko mage vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamano tena kammena tena ajivena hatthiyayi va assayayi va rathayayi va yanayayi va bhogabhogi va mahantam va bhogakkhandham ajjhavasanto’”ti?
an6.18:4.9: Mayapi kho etam, bhikkhave, neva dittham na sutam:
an6.18:4.10: ‘magaviko mage vadhitva vadhitva vikkinamano tena kammena tena ajivena hatthiyayi va assayayi va rathayayi va yanayayi va bhogabhogi va mahantam va bhogakkhandham ajjhavasanto’ti.
an6.18:4.12: Te hi so, bhikkhave, mage vajjhe vadhayupanite papakena manasanupekkhati, tasma so neva hatthiyayi hoti na assayayi na rathayayi na yanayayi na bhogabhogi, na mahantam bhogakkhandham ajjhavasati.
an6.18:4.13: Te hi nama so, bhikkhave, tiracchanagate pane vajjhe vadhayupanite papakena manasanupekkhamano neva hatthiyayi bhavissati na assayayi na rathayayi na yanayayi na bhogabhogi, na mahantam bhogakkhandham ajjhavasissati.
an6.18:4.14: Ko pana vado yam manussabhutam vajjham vadhayupanitam papakena manasanupekkhati.
an6.18:4.15: Tanhi tassa, bhikkhave, hoti digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya.
an6.18:4.16: Kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati”ti.
